title: Lauderdale Co. deputy's son killed in accidental shooting
content:
LAUDERDALE COUNTY, Miss (WTOK) - Lauderdale County Sheriff Billy Sollie says the teenage son of a Lauderdale County deputy has died after an accidental shooting.
It happened around 8:30 Saturday evening in a home on Mt. Horeb Rd. just off Highway 145. Chief Deputy Ward Calhoun says the victim was in the home with a friend at the time of the accidental shooting. The victim was transported by Metro Ambulance to a Meridian hospital where he was pronounced dead.
